auctionExperience.title: Auction Experience
auctionExperience.subtitle: Know the guidelines for fair and transparent auctions

steps.title: Bid Requirements
steps.description: All Bids Are Placed Securely Through Our App. Minimum Increments Are Auto-Calculated. Making Bidding Fast, Fair, And Effortless.

steps.title: Auction Duration
steps.description: Auctions Typically Run Between 1 To 30 Days, Closing Automatically At The Scheduled Time. Stay Tuned And Make Your Best Bid!

steps.title: Reserve Price
steps.description: Some Items Have A Reserve Once Bids Meet Or Exceed It, The Sale Completes Successfully. Every Winning Bid Counts Toward Fair Value.

steps.title: Buyer Obligations
steps.description: Winners Simply Complete Payment Within 48 Hours And Coordinate With The Seller For A Smooth Delivery Or Pickup.

steps.title: Seller Responsibilities
steps.description: Sellers Ship Items Within 5 Business Days Or Arrange Pickup. Every Listing Should Match Its Description For A Trusted Experience.

steps.title: Cancellation Policy
steps.description: Once Bidding Begins, Auctions Can't Be Cancelled Ensuring Fairness For All Participants. Transparency Builds Trust!

auctionExperience.proTip: Every Auction Is Designed To Be Simple, Transparent, And Rewarding. Review Our Full Terms And Enjoy Confident Buying And Selling With Peace Of Mind.

auctionTips.title: Auction Tips & Tricks
auctionTips.subtitle: Maximize your success with expert advice

buyers.title: For Buyers
list: Set a maximum bid amount before auction starts
Bid in the final seconds to avoid bidding wars
Check seller ratings and item condition carefully
Use auto-bid feature for hands-free bidding

sellers.title: For Sellers
list: Use high-quality photos and detailed descriptions
Set competitive starting prices to attract bidders
Respond quickly to buyer inquiries during auction

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using Looking for buying, selling, and finding jobs in Dubai.

list.question: Is Looking free to use?
list.answer: Yes, Looking is free to download and browse. We offer premium features for users who want more visibility.

list.question: How do you verify users?
list.answer: Emirates ID verification for UAE residents ensures a safer marketplace.

list.question: Are payments secure?
list.answer: We use industry-standard encryption and trusted payment gateways to ensure all transactions are secure.

list.question: What can I buy or sell?
list.answer: You can buy and sell almost anything, from electronics and furniture to real estate and jobs.

list.question: Is there an Arabic version?
list.answer: Yes, we are working on localizing the app to support Arabic and other languages.
